text: buffy_summers We have n't been properly introduced . I 'm Buffy , and you 're history !
rupert_giles Poor technique . Prioritizing , sub - par ... Execution was adequate , but a bit too bloody for my taste .
buffy_summers Giles , do n't mention it . It was my * pleasure * to make the world safe for humanity again .
rupert_giles I 'm not saying that your methods are without merit , it 's , uh , y - you're spending too much time and energy . It should simply be : plunge , and move on . Plunge and ... Hello .
buffy_summers Oh , that 's great ! I kill 'em , you fence their stuff . What is it ?
rupert_giles I do n't know .
buffy_summers But it bothers you .
rupert_giles Yes ! Well , I ... I thought this vampire was just on a random kill , but it may be something else .
buffy_summers Something big ?
rupert_giles Yes . I 'd best consult my books .

the_master ' And there will be a time of crisis , of worlds hanging in the balance . And in this time shall come the Anointed , the Master 's great warrior . And the Slayer will not know him , will not stop him , and he will lead her into Hell . ' As it is written , so shall it be . ' Five will die , and from their ashes the Anointed shall rise . The Brethren of Aurelius shall greet him and usher him to his immortal destiny . ' As it is written , so shall it be . ' And one of the brethren shall go out hunting the night before and get himself killed , because he could n't wait to finish his job before he ate . ' Oh , wait . That 's not written anywhere . The Anointed will be my greatest weapon against the Slayer ! If you fail to bring him to me , if you allow that girl to stop you ... Here endeth the lesson .
rupert_giles That symbol on the ring ... I believe it 's the rune for fidelity , but , uh , it does n't connect with any of the sects that I 've studied .
buffy_summers What about this ? On the inside . It 's a sun and three stars . Have n't we seen that somewhere ?
rupert_giles Let me see . No , I - I do n't think this , um , represents any ... .
buffy_summers Wait , it 's right here . Sun and three stars . Yuck , check these guys out . Told you it looked familiar .
rupert_giles Oh , the Order of Aurelius . Yes , you 're right .
buffy_summers Ooo , two points for the Slayer , while the Watcher has yet to score !
buffy_summers Oh ! Owen ! Hi !
rupert_giles What do you want ?
owen_thurman A book ?
rupert_giles Oh !
buffy_summers See , this is a school , and we have students , and they check out books , and then they learn things .
rupert_giles I was beginning to suspect that was a myth .
owen_thurman I lost my Emily . Dickinson . It 's dumb , but I like her around . Kind of a security blanket .
buffy_summers I have something like that . Well , it 's an actual blanket . Uh , and I do n't really carry it around anym - more ... So ! Emily Dickens , huh ? She 's great !
owen_thurman Dickinson .
buffy_summers She 's good also .
rupert_giles Poetry .
owen_thurman I did n't think I 'd find you here .
buffy_summers W ... Why not ?
owen_thurman I , I did n't mean ... I mean ... I think you can read .
buffy_summers Thanks .
owen_thurman But you do n't seem bookwormy . The type of person to lock themselves in a dark room with a lotta musty old books . Oh , and I 've offended you .
buffy_summers No ! No , I 'm just surprised you gave any thought to what I 'm like .
owen_thurman You should n't be .
buffy_summers Oh , well , I * love * books . I mean , I really * love * books .
owen_thurman What 's this ?
buffy_summers Not this one .
rupert_giles This one she does n't love .
rupert_giles Oh , Emily Dickinson .
buffy_summers We 're both fans .
rupert_giles Yes , uh , she 's quite a good poet , I mean for a ... .
buffy_summers A girl ?
rupert_giles For an American .
owen_thurman I 'll , uh , see you in math ... if I open my eyes at some point .
buffy_summers Cool ... .
rupert_giles The Order of Aurelius is a very old and venerated sect . If they 're here , it 's for a good reason .
buffy_summers That was Owen !
rupert_giles Yes , I remember .
buffy_summers Do you have any more copies of Emily Dickinson ? I need one .
rupert_giles Buffy , while the mere fact of you wanting to check out a book would be grounds for a national holiday , I think we should focus on the problem at hand .
buffy_summers Right . I 'm sorry , you 're right . Vampires . Oh . Does this outfit make me look fat ?
willow_rosenberg Owen Thurman was talking to you ?
buffy_summers It 's all true .
willow_rosenberg Wow ! He hardly talks to anyone . He 's solitary , mysterious ... He can brood for forty minutes straight , I 've clocked him .
buffy_summers He was so nice , it was eerie .
willow_rosenberg What did you guys have to talk about ?
buffy_summers Emily Dickinson .
willow_rosenberg He reads Emily Dickinson ? He 's sensitive , yet manly ! Well , wait , you 've never even read her .
willow_rosenberg You vixen !
xander_harris Has anybody given any thought to what this green stuff is ?
buffy_summers Hmm , I 'm avoiding the subject .
xander_harris I think it 's kale , or possibly string cheese . So , Buffy , how 'd the slaying go last night ?
buffy_summers Xander !
xander_harris I mean , how 'd the * laying * go ? No , I do n't mean that either .
buffy_summers It went fine , thank you . There 's some new hoidy - toidy vampire sect in town .
willow_rosenberg That 's bad .
xander_harris Well , hey , they 're bringing in the much needed tourist dollars . Ooo , look at Mr. Excitement .
buffy_summers Owen ! He 's all alone ! Maybe somebody should sit with him .
willow_rosenberg Mm , just to be polite ! Good luck !
xander_harris Okay , what just happened ?
cordelia_chase Look , an empty seat !
buffy_summers Ooo ! Ew ... .
owen_thurman Let me get that .
buffy_summers Thanks ! Boy ! Cordelia 's hips are wider than I thought !
cordelia_chase Eh - heh !
owen_thurman At least you do n't have to eat your Soylent Green .
cordelia_chase Owen , a bunch of us are loitering at the Bronze tonight . You there ?
owen_thurman Who 's all going ?
cordelia_chase Well , um , I 'm gon na be there .
owen_thurman Who else ?
cordelia_chase You mean besides me ?
owen_thurman Buffy , what about you ?
buffy_summers What ?
cordelia_chase No , no , no ! She , uh , she does n't like fun .
owen_thurman How 'bout we meet there at eight ?
buffy_summers Yeah ! Eight ! There !
buffy_summers It 's not that big a deal . It 's just a bunch of people getting together .
willow_rosenberg It 's a very big deal !
buffy_summers It 's not !
willow_rosenberg It is . Tell her !
rupert_giles I 'm afraid it 's very big .
willow_rosenberg Thank you ! Wait !
willow_rosenberg What are you talking about ?
rupert_giles What are * you * talking about ?
Buffy_and_Willow Boys !
rupert_giles Yes , well , I 'm talking about trouble . A violent and disturbing prophecy is about to be fulfilled .
buffy_summers The Order of Aurelius .

rupert_giles You were spot - on about the connection . I 've looked at the writings of Aurelius himself , and he , he prophesied that the brethren of his order would come to the Master and bring him the Anointed .
willow_rosenberg Who 's that ?
rupert_giles Well , I - I do n't know exactly , a - a - a - a warrior , but , but it says he will rise from the ashes of the Five on the evening of the thousandth day after the Advent of Septus .
buffy_summers Well , we 'll be ready whenever it is .
rupert_giles Which is tonight .
buffy_summers Tonight , okay ... Not okay ! It ca n't be tonight !
rupert_giles My calculations are precise .
buffy_summers Nuh ! They 're bad calculations ! Bad !
willow_rosenberg Buffy has a really important date .
buffy_summers Owen !

rupert_giles Alright , I - I'll just jump in my time machine , go back to the twelfth century and ask the vampires to postpone their ancient prophecy for a few days while you take in dinner and a show .
buffy_summers Okay , at this point you 're abusing sarcasm .
rupert_giles Buffy , this is no ordinary vampire . But we have to stop him before he reaches the Master .
buffy_summers But ... Cute guy ! Teenager ! Post - pubescent fantasies !
rupert_giles Those will just have to be put on hold ! The dark forces are aligning against us , and we have a chance to beat them back . Tonight we go into battle !
rupert_giles Perhaps I miscalculated .
buffy_summers I 'm thinking yes .
rupert_giles Well , you know what they say . Ninety percent of the vampire slaying game is , is waiting .
buffy_summers You could n't have told me that ninety percent ago ?
rupert_giles Well , we , we 've certainly waited here long enough .
buffy_summers Besides , there are n't any fresh graves . Who 's gon na rise ?
rupert_giles Apparently no one tonight .
buffy_summers Then I can bail ? I can go to the Bronze and find Owen ?

rupert_giles Oh , very well then . Follow your hormones if you want . But I assume I do n't have to warn you about the hazards of becoming personally involved with someone who 's unaware of your unique condition .
buffy_summers Yeah , yeah , I read the back of the box .
rupert_giles If your identity as the Slayer is revealed it could put you and all those around you in grave danger .
buffy_summers Well , in that case I wo n't wear my button that says , ' I 'm a Slayer . Ask me how ! ' Good night .
rupert_giles ' Five shall die , and from their ashes the Anointed shall rise . ' I was sure it was tonight .
collin I went on an airplane .
andrew_wells A pale horse emerged with death as its rider . You will be judged . You will be judged .

andrew_wells That day 's gon na bring fire . Fire comin ' down ! Judgment ! Do n't think you 're ready , ready to look upon him . If there 's sin in there , there 's sin all around . It 's a liquid . On that day there wo n't be anybody tellin ' us what to do or why we 're doin' it . You ca n't prepare . On that day ... .
van_driver Hey , you got ta sit down . Okay ?
andrew_wells Are you willing to stand with the righteous ?
van_driver Is everyone okay ?
van_driver Are you all right ? Can you move ?
xander_harris So you just went home ?

buffy_summers What was I supposed to do ? Say to Owen , ' Sorry I was late , I was sitting in a cemetery with the librarian waiting for a vampire to rise so I could prevent an evil prophecy from coming to pass ? '
xander_harris Or flat tire ?

buffy_summers I ca n't take this anymore . I feel like everyone is staring at me , the big , hideous , dateless monster . What ? Yeah , that 's right , I have no life , c'mon , nothin' to see here , pal , move it along !
xander_harris You 're acting a little overly , are n't you ? I mean , you could have any guy in school .
buffy_summers He 's not any guy . He 's more ... Oweny .
xander_harris Sure , he 's got a certain Owenosity , but that 's not hard to find . I mean , a lotta guys read . I can read .
owen_thurman Hey , Buffy !
buffy_summers Owen !
xander_harris Oh , look , it 's Owen . Buffy and Owen . And Xander . That 'd be me .
owen_thurman W - where were you last night ?
buffy_summers Oh . Well , um , my watch broke and we do n't have any clocks in our house and so I did n't know what time it was or even what day it was ... .
owen_thurman I thought I was the only one that happened to . How 'bout we try it again for tonight ? I 'll even lend you my watch .
buffy_summers Tonight ? Y - you and me ?
owen_thurman Well , we could invite the chess club , but they drink and they start fights ... .
buffy_summers Oh , no , it 's just ... . Well , I ... . sort of heard that ... . you and Cordelia were ... . somewhat ... . all over each other . A little ... .
owen_thurman I danced with her a couple of times . She 's kinda grabby .
buffy_summers Oh , well , let 's see , if I rearrange that , and I push that to n ... Sure ! Tonight'll work !
owen_thurman Great ! I 'll pick you up at seven ?
buffy_summers Um , seven !
owen_thurman That 's when the little hand 's there .
buffy_summers Oh ! Between the six and the eight .
owen_thurman Um , I 'll see you then !
buffy_summers Tonight ! Is n't that so ?
xander_harris What ?
buffy_summers Me and Owen !
xander_harris Yeah , so it is . It sure is so .
buffy_summers Hey , how 's it going ?
rupert_giles Uh , alright .
buffy_summers That 's great ! I see we 're still working on that Anointed One problem , that 'll probably take you a few days , right ? I mean , that 's one obscure prophecy ... .
rupert_giles Well , yes , there are a few interpretations ... .
buffy_summers So tonight 's looking slow , right ? Probably best to relax and regroup , no big disasters coming , that is * so * good , I will see you tomorrow then ! Bye !
rupert_giles She is the strangest girl .

the_master You have done well . Everything is in place . When this night 's work is done , I will have a mighty ally . I 'll be one step closer to freeing myself from this ... mystical prison . I 've been trapped down here so long I 've nearly forgotten what it 's like on the surface . Well , there 'll be time enough to remember ... when I rule it ! If she tries to stop you , kill her . Give your own lives , but do not fail to bring the Anointed . I know you wo n't disappoint me . Bug !
willow_rosenberg Pick !
buffy_summers Okay , do I wanna appear shy , coy and naive or unrestrained , insatiable and aggressive ?

xander_harris Uh , y'know , Owen is a little home spun , he probably does n't like that overly assertive look . Oh , hey , here 's something . A nice comfy overcoat and a ski cap ! The earflaps will bring out your eyes !
buffy_summers Maybe I should mix and match . Okay , guy 's opinion . Which one do you think Owen will like better ? The red or the peach ?
xander_harris Oh , you mean for kissing you and then telling all his friends how easy you are so the whole school loses respect for you and then talks behind your back ? The red 's fine .
buffy_summers Thanks . I 'll go with the peach .
willow_rosenberg Here , put this on .
xander_harris You 're not bothering me !
willow_rosenberg So , where 's he taking you ?
buffy_summers Oh , I do n't know . Where do you suppose young kids go on dates these days ?
willow_rosenberg Well , I read somewhere once that sometimes they go to movies .
buffy_summers Movies ! Interesting !
willow_rosenberg And I saw on TV once , a bunch of people our age went to a party .
buffy_summers Wow ! I never knew being a teenager was so full of possibilities !
buffy_summers That 's Owen !
buffy_summers That 's Giles .
rupert_giles We need to talk .
buffy_summers Buffy 's not home .
rupert_giles My calculations may not have been as far off as I thought .
buffy_summers ' Five Die in Van Accident ' ?
rupert_giles Out of the ashes of five shall rise the one . That 's the prophecy . Five people have died !
buffy_summers In a car crash .

rupert_giles I know it does n't quite follow , but , but it 's worth investigating . Look ! Among the dead was Andrew Borba , whom the police sought for questioning in a double murder . Now , he may be the Anointed One . The , the bodies have been taken to , to Sunnydale Funeral Home , w - we can ... .

rupert_giles I beg your pardon ?
owen_thurman Hey ! Uh , hi !
rupert_giles You have a date ?
buffy_summers Yes , but I will return those overdue books by tomorrow .
rupert_giles Wait , you 're not getting off that easily .
owen_thurman Man , you really care about your work !
willow_rosenberg Uh , Owen ?
xander_harris Yeah , a couple of things about tonight .
rupert_giles Another date ? Do n't you ever do anything else ?
buffy_summers This is the first date ! There 's never been a date , okay ? This is my maiden voyage !
owen_thurman What , she does n't like to dance ?
xander_harris Well , it 's a little too late to do anything about that . Uh , you should probably know that Buffy does n't like to be kissed . Actually she does n't like to be touched .
willow_rosenberg Xander ... .
xander_harris As a matter of fact , do n't even look at her .
buffy_summers We do n't even know if this is anything .
rupert_giles No , we do n't .
buffy_summers And I have n't had a day off in a while .
rupert_giles True ... .
buffy_summers And a cranky Slayer is a careless Slayer !
rupert_giles Buffy , maintaining a normal social life as a Slayer ... i - i - is problematic at best .
buffy_summers This is the 90 's . The 1990 's , in point of fact , and I can do both . Clark Kent has a job . I just wanna go on a date .
rupert_giles Well , I , I suppose it was a fairly slim lead ... .
buffy_summers Thank you , thank you , thank you ! And look , I wo n't go far , okay ? If the apocalypse comes , beep me .
owen_thurman Is everything cool ?
buffy_summers All set .
rupert_giles Yes , and , uh , you 'll face a pretty hefty fine in the morning .
buffy_summers Well , bye . Do n't wait up .
willow_rosenberg Is something going on ?
rupert_giles Oh , uh , probably not , no . I , uh , I suppose I 'll just , uh , go to the funeral home in case , just see if anything comes up .
willow_rosenberg This is bad .
xander_harris I wish it was just bad .
willow_rosenberg We should ... go along .
xander_harris Yeah , you 're right . I do n't trust that Owen guy . It 's the eyes . Crazy !
willow_rosenberg Xander , we should go with Giles ! He could get in trouble !
xander_harris Oh , he 's gone , uh , it 's , he 's gon na be alright . He 's like super librarian , y'know ? Everyone forgets , Willow , that knowledge is the ultimate weapon .
owen_thurman The thing about Emily Dickinson I love is , is she 's just so incredibly morbid . A lot of loss , a lot of death ... It gets me . With a lot about bees , for some reason .
buffy_summers Did she have a tragic and romantic life ? With a lotta bees ?
owen_thurman Quiet . Kind of sequestered and uneventful . Which I can really relate to . I ... do n't get out much .
buffy_summers I do n't get that .
owen_thurman It 's my fault . I just find most girls pretty frivolous . I mean , there 's a lot more important things in life than dating , y'know ? Oh . Did I say something wrong ?
buffy_summers Uh , no ! Come on .
owen_thurman It 's weird .
buffy_summers What is ?
owen_thurman You ! One minute you 're right there . I 've got you figured . The next , it 's like you 're two people .
buffy_summers Really ? Which one do you like better ?
owen_thurman I 'll let you know .
cordelia_chase Are n't there laws against this sort of thing ? Owen ! Look at you , here all alone ... .
owen_thurman Cordelia , I 'm here with Buffy .
cordelia_chase Oh ! Okay . Do you wanna dance ?
owen_thurman No , I 'm still here with Buffy .
cordelia_chase You are so good to help the needy .
buffy_summers Cordelia , Owen and I would like to be alone right now , and for that to happen , you would have to go somewhere that 's away .
cordelia_chase Well , when you 're ready for the big leagues , let me know .

owen_thurman Are you , uh , having fun ?

xander_harris We saw two guys going in after you . Are they ... .

rupert_giles I 'm afraid not .

xander_harris Look , we 'll get her , just , uh , hang in there .
rupert_giles Do hurry .
owen_thurman Do you want something to eat ?
buffy_summers Sure . Just make it something fattening .
cordelia_chase What a disgusting display . Is that really appropriate behavior in a public forum ? I mean , I 've never seen a girl throw herself at a guy like that . Uhhh !
cordelia_chase Ooo ! Hello , salty goodness ! Pick up the phone , call 911 . That boy is gon na need some serious oxygen after I 'm through with him .
angel Buffy .
buffy_summers Angel .
cordelia_chase Why is this happening to me ?
angel I was hoping I 'd find you here .
buffy_summers You were ?
angel Some serious stuff happening tonight . You need to be out there .
buffy_summers No , not you , too .
angel What do you know ?
buffy_summers Prophecy , Anointed One , yada , yada , yada ... .
angel So you know . Fine . I just thought I 'd warn you .
buffy_summers Warn me ? You see that guy over there at the bar ? He came here to be with me .
angel You 're here on a date ?
buffy_summers Yes ! Why is it such a shock to everyone ?
owen_thurman Here you go .
buffy_summers Oh . Um , Owen , this is Angel . Angel , this is Owen . Who is my date .
angel Hey .
owen_thurman Hey ! So . Where do you know Buffy from ?
angel Work .
owen_thurman You work ?
willow_rosenberg Buffy !
owen_thurman Look at this ! You show up everywhere . Interesting .
xander_harris You do n't know the half of it . What 's he doing here ?
angel I guess it 's the same thing you 're doin' here .

xander_harris Look , we got ta get to , uh ... Uhhhh . We thought it 'd be fun if , uh , we made this a double date !
buffy_summers I did n't know you guys were seeing each other .
willow_rosenberg Oh , yeah , well , we knew it would happen eventually , so we figured , hey ! Why fight it ?
owen_thurman And you guys are thinking double ?
xander_harris 'Cause of ... ... the fun !
owen_thurman And you 're here because of work ?
xander_harris Hey , maybe we should all go somewhere together .
buffy_summers Gee , that 's so nice of you to ask , but Owen and I were , well , sort of ... Owen and I.

willow_rosenberg I 've always wanted to go there !
buffy_summers The funeral home ?
owen_thurman Actually , that sounds kinda cool ! Do you think we could all sneak in ?
xander_harris We saw some guys in there before . They seemed to be having fun !
buffy_summers Bite me !
buffy_summers Um , Owen , I got ta go .
owen_thurman I thought we were going to the funeral home .
buffy_summers No , you ca n't . I 'll tell you what . I 'll be back in a little while .
owen_thurman Buffy ... What 's the deal ? Do you wanna bail on me ?

buffy_summers No ! No ... no ... uh ... You remember when you said I was like two different people ? Well , one of them has to go . But the other one is having a really , really good time , and will come back . I promise .
owen_thurman She 's the strangest girl !

willow_rosenberg The room 's around back .

owen_thurman This is so cool !

buffy_summers Well , w - were they here after you , or w - was it that prophecy thing ?

buffy_summers But he may not be .
rupert_giles We must find out .

buffy_summers I know . I 'll get rid of him .
rupert_giles Y - you ca n't make him go out there alone , we do n't know where the brethren are . I - I'll just ... .

buffy_summers It is .

owen_thurman We 're not done lookin ' around yet !

buffy_summers No it 's not !
owen_thurman Well , I do n't think we 'll find much in here .
buffy_summers That 's the plan .
owen_thurman Okay . What ?
buffy_summers I have to go now . Um , to the bathroom , I have to go to the bathroom . If you hear anything , like a security guard or something , just be really quiet . And barricade the door .

owen_thurman Do they ... usually move ?
